#summary Plug-in installation.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This page describes four installation processes of the plug-in. You can choose either one which suits you best.


= Automatic installation - Drag & Drop =
  * Drag and drop following icon into a running Eclipse Indigo workspace <a href='http://marketplace.eclipse.org/marketplace-client-intro?mpc_install=148833' title='Drag and drop into a running Eclipse Indigo workspace to install Eclipse XPath evaluation plugin'><img src='http://marketplace.eclipse.org/misc/installbutton.png'/></a>
  * Click "Next"
  * Accept license
  * Click "Finish"
  * You might be warned that you are installing unsigned content. If you are OK with it, click "OK" to proceed.
  * At the end of installation process you will be asked to restart Eclipse, click on "Restart now"
  * Go to Window -> Show View -> Other -> XML -> XPath whereas new view, for executing the XPath expressions, will be shown




= Automatic installation from within Eclipse Marketplace =
  * Go to Help -> Eclipse Marketplace
  * Type into the search box "xpath", select "Tools" in the market combo box and "XML" in the categories combo box and click "Go"
  * One of the results should appear "Eclipse XPath evaluation plugin", click on "Install" button next to it
  * Click "Next"
  * Accept license
  * Click "Finish"
  * You might be warned that you are installing unsigned content. If you are OK with it, click "OK" to proceed.
  * At the end of installation process you will be asked to restart Eclipse, click on "Restart now"
  * Go to Window -> Show View -> Other -> XML -> XPath whereas new view, for executing the XPath expressions, will be shown


= Manual installation from within Eclipse =
  * Go to Help -> Install New Software
  * Add repository ("Add.." button)
  * Fill in Name as "XPath" and Location as "http://eclipse-xpath-evaluation-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/eclipse-xpath-evaluation-plugin-update-site/"
  * Select the loaded plug-in in "Uncategorized" section
  * Click "Next", "Next"
  * Accept license
  * Click "Finish"
  * You might be warned that you are installing unsigned content. If you are OK with it, click "OK" to proceed.
  * At the end of installation process you will be asked to restart Eclipse, click on "Restart now"
  * Go to Window -> Show View -> Other -> XML -> XPath whereas new view, for executing the XPath expressions, will be shown


= Manual installation =
  * <a href='http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xpath-evaluation-plugin/downloads/list'>Download provided zip file</a> (choose the latest version) with the plug-in implementation (contains both, binary + source code)
  * Extract the zip file into the home directory of your eclipse installation
  * Launch eclipse IDE
  * Go to Window -> Show View -> Other -> XML -> XPath whereas new view, for executing the XPath expressions, will be shown
